Although all the maps we played in the previous series remained the same, the changes in the in-game graphic details take people to different places. Compared to the previous series, no changes were made on the weapons, but they improved the appearance of the weapons a lot in detail. In addition to gaining a very realistic image, when you touch the trigger, you feel that you have a gun in your hand.
Although the change of characters is not played much compared to the previous series, the changes in the graphic details are nice. Kantir is always beautiful.

The game of my early adolescence - it put hair on my balls and kept me from completing my homework. Back when community servers in games still thrived, I spent countless hours playing Jailbreak and Zombie Escape, creating some of the best gaming memories I have. Won't someone tell me where the years have gone?

I originally bought this just so I could get the definitive GMod experience. but after 75 minutes of gameplay with bots (Along with adding some maps via mods), I can safely say this game is really good, and worth playing instead of sitting in your library while you play Garry's Mod.

The controls are smooth like butter, and very nice. I love pressing the B key to buy stuff. It's really enjoyable!

Maps are big, and fun to play on, but with bots it may get repetitive.

and the music is non-existent.

9/10
